description: Situated near the church of the same name in the upper part of Noto’s historic centre, this restaurant is one of the best in the area. In a modern and minimalist setting, Marco Baglieri serves excellent cuisine with an elaborate and Baroque feel, almost as if he were paying tribute to Noto itself, one of the most fascinating towns in Sicily. An extraordinary dining experience.
